title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Coffee Table", March 10, 1937
medium: Graphite and red colored pencil on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in stamp in graphite, lower right: 8605/F.S./ANDERSON, OLSSON/DILLM./D./ 3/10/37, 3/15/37, 1, MASTER.; inscribed in graphite, lower left: ONE COFFEE TABLE/SOLID WOOD CORNER/BAND SAW ROUND CORNER/SIZE 36" X 16 " X 16" HIGH/WHITE OAK / TOP COVERED WITH LEATHER; dimensions, materials, and instructions in graphite.
description: Plan, perspective, and section drawing of low coffee table. Long, rectangular shape of table; top of table curves down at each end to create legs; shallow open shelf below surface. Table in white oak, leather on top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Coffee Table", March 10, 1937.
March 10, 1937. Graphite and red colored pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-936.
